message: Hello everyone, I encourage you to check out www.cod360.com for news, reviews, and content about your favorite games but more specific Call of Duty series.
I also have Call of Duty Black Ops group on here https://convore.com/call-of-duty-black-ops/
and just made a Mortal Kombat Group, https://convore.com/mortal-kombat/
Do you actually think that we have to pay to play?
i think after their only other long standing franchise is now dead, they will do anything to recoup.
